english.segment1: Every morning praise I sing to Thee. You're slow to wrath and. Swift to bless my soul. Your love endures unchanging. O hallelujah
english.segment2: CHORUS: Cover me with Your grace. Shine on me with Your light. Take Your arms hold me tight. Keep me caught in the moment
english.segment3: Every night I pray myself to sleep. I look to You and plead. My soul You'll keep. You endure unchanging. O hallelujah
english.segment5: You've opened my eyes now. The mystery is clear to me. That in You and You alone. I find the love that sets me free
